snippet: From Scandinavia, France, England and the United States, these recipes sweetly tweak tradition. (Article plus video.)
abstract: Melissa Clark Cookbooks column highlights several cookbooks offering subtle thrills and twists on classic baked desserts; recipes for Violet Bakery rye brownies, gateau Breton and raspberry rose rugelach given.
lead_paragraph: From Scandinavia, France, England and the United States, these recipes sweetly tweak tradition. (Article plus video.)

headline.main: Baking Cookbooks That (Gently) Push the Limits
